ai-patthana14.21:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.21:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of a teaching, not for the sake of these three. ...
ai-patthana14.21:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of a thought ... Three conditions for the sake of non-existence.
ai-patthana14.21:3.1_0: Experiencing the teaching with the object, and those with the reason for these three reasons. ...
ai-patthana14.21:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana14.21:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
